channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Launch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Launch

item.title: CVE-2023-23348|2024-08-02T10:28:40.868Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch could disclose sensitive information if a manual edit of a configuration file has been performed.

item.title: CVE-2023-45700|2024-08-02T20:29:32.576Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch is vulnerable to HTML injection. This vulnerability may allow a user to embed arbitrary HTML tags in the Web UI potentially leading to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-45703|2024-08-02T20:29:32.699Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch may mishandle input validation of an uploaded archive file leading to a denial of service due to resource exhaustion.

item.title: CVE-2023-45701|2024-08-02T20:29:31.596Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-45702|2024-08-02T20:29:32.293Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: An HCL UrbanCode Deploy Agent installed as a Windows service in a non-standard location could be subject to a denial of service attack by local accounts..
